name: Rogue Climber
description:
Rogue Climber is a game I developed in 48 hours for the GamesPlusJam3 game jam.

The theme I was assigned was Climbing Roguelike (obvious I know...).

Watch out for falling rocks and Cliff Goblins who enjoy throwing knives at would be climbers.

You only have limited energy and time to reach the top, so manage carefully and rest on ledges to recover energy.
